mapper.select: SELECT MAX(TEMP.type) type,TEMP.USER_ID FROM ( SELECT USER_ID,'1' type FROM induction where GIVING_ID = #{givingid} UNION ALL SELECT USER_ID,'2' type FROM abnormal where status >= 4 and error_type = 'PR013012' and date_format(finished_date,'%Y%m') > date_format(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y%m') and DAYOFWEEK(date_format(finished_date,'%Y%m%d')) != 7 #不等于周六（待考虑） and DAYOFWEEK(date_format(finished_date,'%Y%m%d')) != 1 #不等于周日（待考虑） UNION ALL SELECT USER_ID,'3' type FROM abnormal where ERROR_TYPE = 'PR013013' and DATE_FORMAT(abnormal.occurrence_date,'%Y%m') <= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH),'%Y%m') and DATE_FORMAT(abnormal.finished_date,'%Y%m') >= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH),'%Y%m') UNION ALL SELECT USER_ID,'4' type FROM retire where GIVING_ID = #{givingid} ) TEMP GROUP BY TEMP.USER_ID
